name: Tumblr In Lign Images larger
description:
You know who before you click an image that is in a text post its smaller?
Well recently I noticed that tumblr seemed to make it even smaller and I'm just not down with this.  So I created this hack so you could make it larger.  Meh its pretty simple its just max width.
additional_info:
if you want them to be a little smaller or a little bigger just change the 300 to your desired pixel number.

it would probably be better for you if you make your max-width not extend 500 because it won't fit in the dash posts
